attributes.action: Change government policy to stop saying no one voted for Brexit to be poorer.
attributes.additional_details: There was no indication on the ballot paper to claim any guarantees on the financial aspects of Brexit.
attributes.background: Many of us voted on the principle of regaining full sovereignty regardless of the cost, if any, to be free from the EU.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what specific change in Government policy you'd like.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
